definition: the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
surname Guan
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
surname Huai
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to arrive/most/to/until

sentences.english: To let you know how much your thoughtfulness is appreciated .
sentences.chinese: 告訴你，我多麼感謝你對我的關懷備至。

sentences.english: Mother always cares about my studies.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽對我總是關懷備至。

sentences.english: Care, whole-hearted service, we look forward to seeing you.
sentences.chinese: 關懷備至，用心服務，我們期待着您。

sentences.english: Through word honor, he took good care visits.
sentences.chinese: 玥藉詞探望榮，關懷備至。

sentences.english: When weather changes or physical discomfort will ask people whether they feel hot, show the utmost solicitude.
sentences.chinese: 逢天氣劇變或身體不適便噓寒問暖，關懷備至。

sentences.english: My friend am bad to me when I am ill.
sentences.chinese: 我生病時我的同學對我關懷備至。

sentences.english: It's like, I think a soccer mom usually is considered a caring parent.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲“足球媽媽”是那種關懷備至的家長。

sentences.english: To let you know how much your thoughtfulness is appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 告訴你，我多麼感謝你對我關懷備至。

sentences.english: She shows loving care for me and hastens to add more food on my plate until I eat myself sick.
sentences.chinese: 夫人關懷備至，趕緊在盤子里加食，直到我喫得撐死。

definition: to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
honorable even in defeat (idiom)
to make an effort to become strong (idiom); determined to do better/to pull one's socks up
willingly and gladly (idiom)
to gesticulate/to make lively gestures (while talking)/also written 比手劃腳|比手划脚
lit. to hate iron for not becoming steel/to feel resentful towards sb for failing to meet expectations and impatient to see improvement (idiom)
conciliation/mediation/to mollify/to propitiate/to reconcile
to make a concession/to be accommodating
midwife
to play golf
daring/presumptuous/daredevil
open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
masquerade
flippant and insincere (piece of writing or speech)/glib-tongued/oily
lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/nitpicking/overcritical
to evade responsibility/to shirk
